az-104_aws-saa-c03.targetAudience: Individuals who have experience designing distributed applications. It is for those who want to validate their ability to design and implement well-architected solutions on AWS.
az-104_aws-saa-c03.careerBenefit: Opens doors to roles like Cloud Architect, Solutions Architect, and Cloud Engineer. It is one of the most sought-after certifications in the cloud industry.
az-104_aws-saa-c03.jobMarketBenefit: Extremely high. Many companies migrating to or building on AWS explicitly require this certification for cloud architecture roles.

az-104_aws-saa-c03.targetAudience: Azure Administrators who manage cloud services that span storage, networking, and compute cloud capabilities, with a deep understanding of each service across the full IT lifecycle.
az-104_aws-saa-c03.careerBenefit: Prepares individuals for roles like Cloud Administrator, Azure Administrator, and Systems Administrator for cloud environments.
az-104_aws-saa-c03.jobMarketBenefit: Very strong, especially in enterprises that have a significant Microsoft footprint and are transitioning to Azure.

aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.targetAudience: Anyone looking to build a foundational knowledge of the AWS cloud, including those in technical, managerial, sales, purchasing, or financial roles.
aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.careerBenefit: A great entry-point into cloud computing and the AWS ecosystem. It provides the vocabulary and basic concepts needed for more advanced certifications.
aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.jobMarketBenefit: Good for entry-level roles or for non-technical professionals who need to communicate effectively about AWS services.

aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.targetAudience: Business professionals, such as marketers, sales leaders, and executives, who are not necessarily technical but need to understand cloud concepts to make business decisions.
aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.careerBenefit: Validates a broad knowledge of cloud concepts and how Google Cloud products and services can help an organization's business goals.
aws-clf-c02_gcp-cde.jobMarketBenefit: Beneficial for roles involved in business strategy and digital transformation within organizations that use or are considering Google Cloud.
